name: The Corpsmen
description:
Summary


The Corpsmen is a deck-building roguelite where you build and lead a team of creatures to fight, hunt and harvest other monsters. Your creatures will grow and learn new skills according to how you construct them. Harvest and collect parts to create new creations and explore the abilities of the creatures you create. In The Corpsmen, you are encouraged to develop your creations and see how they perform, mission after mission.

The Story

The City of Somerley. The last bastion of mankind. Protected by its walls and its Corpsmen. You are a Corpsmen; charged with assembling together creatures from the very monsters you fight against. They will grow as you fight for the city. They may fall, but your city will not. You will make them better, faster and stronger than those before.

Create your creatures

Stitch together creatures you have harvested. Tailor them to how you play.

Fight with them

Use your creations to brave the frontiers and see the world. Harvest new samples to take back to make new creations.

See their Skills Grow

Grow your creations. Watch as they develop new skills and improve old ones.

Entering Early Access


The Game will be entering Early Access to allow for testing and feed back with:
• 2 Areas
• 6 Biomes
• 12 Harvestable Creatures
• 220 Cards
• 5 Events

Road Map


Our plans for this game is for it to have:
• 5 Areas
• 15 Biomes
• 80+ Harvestable Creatures
• 400+ Cards
• 60+ Events
• A hand crafted story of adventure and coming of age.
